remarks.format: ## Remarks 當對應至的項目`cacheKey`從快取移除參數，目前項目的快取的回應無效。When the item corresponding to the `cacheKey` parameter is removed from the cache, the cached response of the current item is invalid. ## Examples 下列範例是輸出快取的 ASP.NET 使用者控制項。The following example is an ASP.NET user control that is output cached. 控制呼叫的程式碼方法中所儲存之項目的索引鍵做為其參數傳遞的物件。The code for the control calls the method with the key of an item stored in the object passed as its parameter. 如果項目不存在於快取中，就會儲存在輸出快取中的控制項的回應失效。If the item does not exist in the cache, the control's response that was stored in the output cache is invalidated. 這表示在後續要求中，新版本的控制項的回應會加入至輸出快取。This means that on the subsequent request, a new version of the control's response will be added to the output cache. 接下來，程式碼會檢查是否與項目相關聯`bookData`金鑰儲存在`Cache`物件，並會顯示兩行文字取決於結果的其中一個。Next, the code checks whether an item associated with a `bookData` key is stored in the `Cache` object, and displays one of two lines of text dependent upon the result. 然後，此程式碼設定屬性控制項，名為`dgBooks`，呼叫自訂`DataHelper`類別共用`GetBookData`方法，並於其中填入與方法。Then, the code sets the property of a control, which is named `dgBooks`, with a call to a custom `DataHelper` class' shared `GetBookData` method, and populates the with the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > AddOnSendingHeaders 方法不會叫用，如果原生模組第一次排清回應。The AddOnSendingHeaders method is not invoked if the native module flushes the response first. 虛擬事件 OnSendingHeaders 不同 IHttpModule 層級管線事件，因為它要求每個訂用帳戶，而不是每個應用程式的訂用帳戶。The pseudo-event OnSendingHeaders differs from the IHttpModule-level pipeline event in that it is a per-request subscription rather than a per-application subscription. 其目的是回呼可能會修改回應狀態碼，或可能會設定回應的 cookie 或標頭。The intent is that the callback may modify the response status code or may set a response cookie or header. 其他的使用方式的事項及警告：Other usage notes and caveats: - IIS integrated 的管線模式管線中執行時，才，而且只有在回應標頭尚未針對目前的要求已傳送，這個方法會有效。This method is effective only when IIS runs in integrated pipeline mode pipeline and only if response headers haven't yet been sent for the current request. - ASP.NET 執行階段不保證任何關於的執行緒叫用回呼。The ASP.NET runtime does not guarantee anything about the thread that the callback is invoked on. 例如，可能會叫用回呼以同步方式在背景執行緒中如果正在執行背景清除。For example, the callback may be invoked synchronously in a background thread if a background flush is being performed. 不保證可在這類執行緒中使用。 is not guaranteed to be available in such a thread. - 回呼必須呼叫操縱回應實體本文或排清，產生的任何方法。The callback must not call any method that manipulates the response entity body or that results in a flush. 例如，不可呼叫回呼，因為該方法可能會操作回應實體本文。For example, the callback must not call , as that method may manipulate the response entity body. - 回呼必須只包含執行短期同步程式碼。The callback must contain only short-running synchronous code. 嘗試叫用非同步作業，或等候這類作業可能會導致死結。Attempting to invoke an asynchronous operation or wait on such an operation could result in a deadlock. - 回呼必須不會擲回例外狀況。否則行為是未定義。The callback must not throw an exception; otherwise behavior is undefined.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您使用方法來傳送快取特定標頭，並同時使用快取物件模型 () 以設定快取原則，與快取 HTTP 回應標頭 (`Cache-Control`， `Expires`， `Last-Modified`， `Pragma`，和`Vary`) 快取物件模型使用時可能會被刪除。If you use the method to send cache-specific headers and at the same time use the cache object model () to set cache policy, HTTP response headers that pertain to caching (`Cache-Control`, `Expires`, `Last-Modified`, `Pragma`, and `Vary`) might be deleted when the cache object model is used. 此行為可讓 ASP.NET 成為維護限制最嚴格的設定。This behavior enables ASP.NET to maintain the most restrictive settings. 例如，考慮一個網頁，內含使用者控制項。For example, consider a page that includes user controls. 如果這些控制項有快取原則衝突，則將使用限制最嚴格的快取原則。If those controls have conflicting cache policies, the most restrictive cache policy will be used. 如果一個使用者控制項設定標頭 」`Cache-Control: Public`"和另一個使用者控制項設定更具限制性的標頭 」`Cache-Control: Private`」 透過呼叫，則 「`Cache-Control: Private`"標頭會隨著回應一起傳送。If one user control sets the header "`Cache-Control: Public`" and another user control sets the more restrictive header "`Cache-Control: Private`" via calls to , then the "`Cache-Control: Private`" header will be sent with the response. 標準 HTTP/1.1 標頭的清單，請參閱 14 中，「 標頭欄位定義 」 一節，在[超文字傳輸通訊協定-HTTP/1.1](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=73147) World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) 網站上的規格。For a list of standard HTTP/1.1 headers, see section 14, "Header Field Definitions," in the [Hypertext Transfer Protocol -- HTTP/1.1](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=73147) specification on the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) Web site. ## Examples 下列範例會呼叫方法，將自訂標頭傳送要求的用戶端物件。The following example calls the method to add a custom header to the object sent to the requesting client. remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要允許記錄在記錄檔中指定的字串，必須先啟用**URI 查詢**選項**擴充記錄內容**的網站，您想要在 IIS 中記錄的活動 對話方塊.To allow for the specified string to be recorded in the log file, you first must enable the **URI Query** option of the **Extended Logging Properties** dialog box for the site that you want to log activity for in IIS. 若要自訂擴充在 IIS 6.0 中的記錄，請遵循下列步驟：To customize extended logging in IIS 6.0, follow these steps: 1. 在 IIS 管理員 中，展開 本機電腦 節點，展開 Web 或 FTP 站台資料夾、 Web 或 FTP 站台，以滑鼠右鍵按一下，然後按一下**屬性**。In IIS Manager, expand the local computer node, expand the Web or FTP Sites folder, right-click the Web or FTP site, and then click **Properties**. 2. 按一下**Web 或 FTP 站台**索引標籤，然後選取**啟用記錄**核取方塊 （如果尚未選取）。Click the **Web or FTP Site** tab, and then select the **Enable logging** check box (if it is not already selected). 3. 在**作用中的記錄檔格式**方塊中，按一下**W3C 擴充記錄檔格式**。In the **Active log format** box, click **W3C Extended Log File Format**. 4. 按一下**屬性**。Click **Properties**. 5. 按一下**進階**索引標籤上，選取您想要記錄，然後按一下屬性**確定**。Click the **Advanced** tab, select the properties that you want to log, and then click **OK**. ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何將字串附加至記錄檔。The following example shows how to append a string to the log. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ClientDisconnectedToken As CancellationToken
public: property System::Threading::CancellationToken ClientDisconnectedToken { System::Threading::CancellationToken get(); };

summary.span: Gets a object that is tripped when the client disconnects.

span.span: Gets a object that is tripped when the client disconnects.

value.span: 取消語彙基元。

span.span: The cancellation token.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個 API 已具備執行緒安全。This API is thread-safe. 不過，有一些限制，應該如何使用取消語彙基元。However, there are some restrictions on how the cancellation token should be used. 不當使用它可能會導致競爭條件、 死結或其他意外的行為。Using it incorrectly can lead to race conditions, deadlocks, or other unexpected behavior. 請注意下列指導方針：Keep in mind the following guidelines: - 因為 ASP.NET 將處置的取消語彙基元要求結尾，請確定在未呼叫此 api 在單一要求的範圍之外。Ensure that you don't call into this API outside the bounds of a single request, because ASP.NET will dispose of the cancellation token at the end of the request. 沒有保證權杖就會永遠轉換成已取消的狀態之前加以處置。There is no guarantee that the token will ever transition to a canceled state before it is disposed. 比方說，如果不需要中斷連線的用戶端完成要求時，會處置語彙基元而不需先取消。For example, if the request finishes without the client having disconnected, the token will be disposed without having first been canceled. - 不需要等候，如這個非同步通知的目的，就失去了，而且可能會導致死結。Do not wait on the , as this defeats the purpose of an asynchronous notification and can cause deadlocks. - 請勿呼叫多載，就會叫用回呼原始物件。Do not call the overloads which invoke the callback on the original object. - 請勿使用物件或其他非安全執行緒 ASP.NET 內建物件提供給回呼內部方法。Do not use the object or other non-thread-safe ASP.NET intrinsic objects from within the callback provided to the method. 回呼可能會執行與其他 ASP.NET 或應用程式程式碼。The callback may be running concurrently with other ASP.NET or application code. - 保留執行短期的回呼方法和非封鎖。Keep the callback methods short-running and non-blocking. - 請致力將避免擲回例外狀況從回呼方法中。Make every effort to avoid throwing exceptions from within the callback methods. 在網際網路資訊服務 (IIS) 7.5 或更高的版本，在整合模式中才支援這個屬性。This property is only supported in Internet Information Service (IIS) 7.5 or higher in integrated mode. 如果您沒有正確的 IIS 版本或管線模式，叫用就會擲回。If you invoke it without the right IIS version or pipeline mode, a is thrown. 若要判斷 IIS 版本，請使用。To determine the IIS version, use . 若要判斷管線模式，請使用。To determine the pipeline mode, use .

summary.span: Closes the socket connection to a client.

span.span: Closes the socket connection to a client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法以突然方式終止用戶端的連接，並不適用於一般的 HTTP 要求處理。This method terminates the connection to the client in an abrupt manner and is not intended for normal HTTP request processing. 方法會重設封包傳送到用戶端，可能會造成的緩衝處理回應資料伺服器、 用戶端，或某處之間要卸除。The method sends a reset packet to the client, which can cause response data that is buffered on the server, the client, or somewhere in between to be dropped. 不過，通常您應該呼叫而如果您想要往前跳至事件，並將傳送至用戶端的回應。However, typically you should call instead if you want to jump ahead to the event and send a response to the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法只為了與 ASP 的相容性 — 也就是以 COM 為基礎的 Web 程式設計技術，前面有 ASP.NET 相容性。This method is provided only for compatibility with ASP—that is, for compatibility with COM-based Web-programming technology that preceded ASP.NET. 如果您想要往前跳至事件，並將傳送至用戶端的回應，它通常最好是呼叫改為。If you want to jump ahead to the event and send a response to the client, it is usually preferable to call instead. 若要模擬的行為`End`ASP 中的方法，這個方法會嘗試以引發例外狀況。To mimic the behavior of the `End` method in ASP, this method tries to raise a exception. 如果此嘗試成功，將會中止呼叫執行緒，即危害到您的網站效能。If this attempt is successful, the calling thread will be aborted, which is detrimental to your site's performance. 在此情況下，在呼叫之後任何程式碼執行方法。In that case, no code after the call to the method is executed. 如果方法不是無法提高，而是會清除回應位元組至用戶端。If the method is not able to raise a , it instead flushes the response bytes to the client. 這會同步執行，這也可能危害到您的網站效能。It does this synchronously, which can also be detrimental to your site's performance. 在任一情況下 (不論是否成功引發例外狀況)，回應管線向前跳至事件。In either case (whether or not a exception is successfully raised), the response pipeline jumps ahead to the event. 方法不會引發例外狀況，程式碼的呼叫後方方法可能會執行。The method does not raise an exception, and code after the call to the method might be executed. 如果您是要避免執行後續的程式碼，而且會降低效能可接受的您可以呼叫而不是。If your intention is to avoid execution of subsequent code, and if the performance penalty of is acceptable, you can call instead of .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您停用或變更物件上使用的回應標頭， ， ，或物件。The property gives you the ability to disable or change the object on a response header by using the , , , or object. 預設編碼方式值是類別。The default encoding value is the class. 型別變更屬性，您可以提高特定惡意攻擊或透過回應標頭傳送的原因機密資料的風險。By changing the type of the property, you can potentially increase the risk of certain malicious attacks or cause sensitive data to be sent through the response header. 標頭插入式攻擊，部份，即可避免離開屬性的預設設定的回應。Header injection attacks can be avoided, in part, by leaving the property of a response to the default setting. 針對應用程式容易遭受攻擊，無法回應未受信任的資料做為回應標頭的一部分。An attack against a vulnerable application could echo back entrusted data as part of a response header. 如果接續標頭中的線條，或如果任何標頭會建構為基礎的不受信任的資料的結果，應驗證標頭資料傳送至回應資料流之前，先停用由於需求。If the is disabled because of a requirement for continuation lines in a header or if any header is constructed based on the result of untrusted data, the header data should be validated before sending to the response stream.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回`false`下列條件成立：The property returns `false` when the following conditions are true: - 用戶端的連線已終止。The connection to the client was terminated. 這種情形叫用方法，或用戶端停止執行的網頁，或瀏覽至另一個頁面。This can occur if the method was invoked, or if the client stopped execution of the Web page or browsed to another page. - 處理要求的物件是`null`或方法會傳回`false`。The object that is handling the request is `null` or the method returns `false`. 如果自訂物件會處理要求，然後在方法可能會根據設定自訂準則。If a custom object handles the request, then the method might be set based on custom criteria. 例如，自訂背景工作要求可能會在一段時間之後強制逾時。For example, the custom worker request might force a time-out after a period of time. ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來檢查是否要求網頁用戶端仍然連接到伺服器。The following example uses the property to check whether the client that is requesting the page remains connected to the server. 如果為 true，程式碼會呼叫方法和用戶端會檢視另一頁。If is true, the code calls the method, and the client will view another page. 如果為 false，則程式碼會呼叫方法和所有的網頁處理已終止。If is false, then the code calls the method and all page processing is terminated. remarks.format: ## Remarks 平台的網際網路內容選取項目 (PICS) 是全球資訊網協會 (W3C) 標準，設定標記的內容。Platform for Internet Content Selection (PICS) is a World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) standard for content labeling. PICS 是基本上是一種語言建立分級系統。PICS is essentially a language for creating a ratings system. 任何值可以是 PICS 標籤。ASP.NET 不會驗證標籤。Any value can be a PICS label; ASP.NET does not validate the label. 字串的最大長度為 255 個字元。The maximum length of the string is 255 characters. 如需 PICS 標準和語法的詳細資訊，請參閱[World Wide Web Consortium](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37125)網站。For more information about PICS standards and syntax, see the [World Wide Web Consortium](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37125) Web site. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示影像的 ASP.NET 網頁。The following example is an ASP.NET page that displays an image. 頁面的程式碼呼叫方法，以設定 HTTP`PICS-Label`回應標頭。The page code calls the method to set the HTTP `PICS-Label` header for the response. 會當做參數傳遞的字串方法代表從網際網路內容分級關聯 (ICRA) 網站上產生的評等標籤。The string that is passed as the parameter to the method represents a rating label generated from the Internet Content Rating Association (ICRA) Web site. remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫就相當於呼叫與第二個參數設定為`true`。Calling is equivalent to calling with the second parameter set to `true`. 呼叫哪些會擲回完成時的例外狀況。 calls which throws a exception upon completion. 這個例外狀況會有不利的影響，對 Web 應用程式效能。This exception has a detrimental effect on Web application performance. 因此，我們建議您使用而不是這個多載多載，並傳遞`false`如`endResponse`參數，然後再呼叫方法。Therefore, we recommend that instead of this overload you use the overload and pass `false` for the `endResponse` parameter, and then call the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 方法。For more information, see the method. > [!NOTE] > 僅適用行動網頁，如果您的應用程式依賴無 cookie 工作階段，或可能會收到要求，從行動裝置需要無 cookie 工作階段之路徑中使用波狀符號 （~） 導致建立新的工作階段，可能遺失工作階段資料。For mobile pages only, if your application relies on cookieless sessions, or might receive requests from mobile devices that require cookieless sessions, using a tilde (~) in a path can result in creating a new session and potentially losing session data. 行動控制項以路徑上設定屬性，例如"~ / 路徑 」，解析路徑使用"~ / 路徑 」 之前將其指派給屬性。To set a property on a mobile control with a path such as "~/path", resolve the path using "~/path" before assigning it to the property. ASP.NET 會藉由傳回 302 的 HTTP 狀態碼來執行重新導向。ASP.NET performs the redirection by returning a 302 HTTP status code. 將控制權轉移到另一個頁面的替代方式是方法。An alternative way to transfer control to another page is the method. 方法是通常更有效率，因為它不會往返造成用戶端。The method is typically more efficient because it does not cause a round trip to the client. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 將使用者重新導向至其他頁面](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/daef3f43-e018-43aa-b43c-46b27bac599e)。For more information, see [How to: Redirect Users to Another Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/daef3f43-e018-43aa-b43c-46b27bac599e). ## Examples 下列範例會強制無條件的重新導向至另一個網站。The following example forces an unconditional redirection to another Web site. remarks.format: ## Remarks 絕對 URL (例如，http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx)或相對 URL (例如 Default.aspx) 可以指定的目標位置，但某些瀏覽器可能會拒絕相對 URL。An absolute URL (for example, http://www.contoso.com/default.aspx) or a relative URL (for example, Default.aspx) can be specified for the target location but some browsers may reject a relative URL. 當您使用這個方法中網頁處理常式終止要求一頁並啟動新要求的另一個頁面上，設定`endResponse`至`false`，然後呼叫方法。When you use this method in a page handler to terminate a request for one page and start a new request for another page, set `endResponse` to `false` and then call the method. 如果您指定`true`如`endResponse`參數，這個方法會呼叫原始要求，會擲回方法完成時的例外狀況。If you specify `true` for the `endResponse` parameter, this method calls the method for the original request, which throws a exception when it completes. 這個例外狀況，並在 Web 應用程式效能，這就是為什麼傳遞的不利影響`false`如`endResponse`建議參數。This exception has a detrimental effect on Web application performance, which is why passing `false` for the `endResponse` parameter is recommended. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 方法。For more information, see the method. > [!NOTE] > 行動頁面，如果您的應用程式依賴無 cookie 工作階段，或可能會收到要求，從行動裝置需要無 cookie 工作階段之路徑中使用波狀符號 （~） 可以建立新的工作階段及可能遺失工作階段的資料。For mobile pages, if your application relies on cookieless sessions, or might receive requests from mobile devices that require cookieless sessions, using a tilde (~) in a path can create a new session and potentially lose session data. 行動控制項以路徑上設定屬性，例如"~ / 路徑 」，解析路徑使用"~ / 路徑 」 之前將其指派給屬性。To set a property on a mobile control with a path such as "~/path", resolve the path using "~/path" before assigning it to the property. ASP.NET 會藉由傳回 302 的 HTTP 狀態碼來執行重新導向。ASP.NET performs the redirection by returning a 302 HTTP status code. 將控制權轉移到另一個頁面的替代方式是方法。An alternative way to transfer control to another page is the method. 方法是通常更有效率，因為它不會往返造成用戶端。The method is typically more efficient because it does not cause a round trip to the client. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 將使用者重新導向至其他頁面](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/daef3f43-e018-43aa-b43c-46b27bac599e)。For more information, see [How to: Redirect Users to Another Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/daef3f43-e018-43aa-b43c-46b27bac599e). ## Examples 下列範例會使用屬性來檢查是否要求網頁用戶端仍然連接到伺服器。The following example uses the property to check whether the client that is requesting the page remains connected to the server. 如果為 true，程式碼會呼叫方法和用戶端會檢視另一頁。If is true, the code calls the method, and the client will view another page. 如果為 false，則程式碼會呼叫方法和所有的網頁處理已終止。If is false, then the code calls the method and all page processing is terminated. span.span: to suppress the default Cache Control: private header for the current HTTP response; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，ASP.NET 會`Cache-Control: private`回應標頭除非這個回應已指定明確的快取原則。By default, ASP.NET sends a `Cache-Control: private` response header unless an explicit cache policy has been specified for this response. 這個屬性可讓隱藏每個要求為基礎的這個預設回應標頭。This property allows suppressing this default response header on a per-request basis. 標頭可以仍然隱藏整個應用程式藉由設定中[httpRuntime 元素 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369)或[outputCache 項目，快取 （ASP.NET 設定結構描述）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/47cd2b47-316f-4dfd-bbf8-539be3066fee).The header can still be suppressed for the entire application by setting in [httpRuntime Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/e9b81350-8aaf-47cc-9843-5f7d0c59f369) or [outputCache Element for caching (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/47cd2b47-316f-4dfd-bbf8-539be3066fee). 抑制預設時謹慎小心`Cache-Control: private`標頭，做為 proxy 與其他媒介之間進行可能沒有這個標頭的回應可快取，以視為預設。Use caution when suppressing the default `Cache-Control: private` header, as proxies and other intermediaries may treat responses without this header as cacheable by default. 此處理方式可能會導致機密資訊不小心快取。This treatment can lead to the inadvertent caching of sensitive information. 請參閱[RFC 2616，秒 13.4](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616)如需詳細資訊。See [RFC 2616, Sec. 13.4](http://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2616) for more information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，表單驗證會將 HTTP 401 狀態碼轉換為 302，以便重新導向至登入頁面。By default, forms authentication converts HTTP 401 status codes to 302 in order to redirect to the login page. 這不是適當特定類別的錯誤，例如當驗證成功，但授權失敗，或當目前的要求是 AJAX 或 web 服務要求。This isn't appropriate for certain classes of errors, such as when authentication succeeds but authorization fails, or when the current request is an AJAX or web service request. 這個屬性會提供方法來抑制重新導向行為，並將原始的狀態碼傳送給用戶端。This property provides a way to suppress the redirect behavior and send the original status code to the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果從用戶端接收或傳輸回到用戶端時，不會驗證從 Web 用戶端收到的輸入，動態產生的 HTML 頁面可能導致安全性風險。Dynamically generated HTML pages can introduce security risks if input received from Web clients is not validated either when it is received from a client or when it is transmitted back to a client. 輸入提交到網站並稍後寫回至用戶端中內嵌惡意指令碼可能會來自受信任的來源。Malicious script that is embedded in input submitted to a Web site and later written back out to a client can appear to be originating from a trusted source. 此安全性風險被指跨網站指令碼的攻擊。This security risk is referred to as a cross-site scripting attack. 您應該一律驗證將會從您的網站中傳輸到用戶端瀏覽器時，從用戶端收到的資料。You should always validate data that is received from a client when it will be transmitted from your site to client browsers. 此外，每當您寫出為 HTML 做為輸入收到的任何資料，您應該加以編碼使用的技術，例如或來防止執行惡意指令碼。Moreover, whenever you write out as HTML any data that was received as input, you should encode it using a technique such as or to prevent malicious script from executing. 這項技術可用於在接收時未經過驗證的資料。This technique is useful for data that was not validated when it was received. 當您編碼或篩選資料時，您必須指定字元，設定您的網頁，讓您篩選條件可以識別並移除任何的位元組序列不屬於設定 （例如非英數字元順序） 和可能中內嵌惡意指令碼它們。When you encode or filter data, you must specify a character set for your Web pages so that your filter can identify and remove any byte sequences that do not belong to that set (such as nonalphanumeric sequences) and could potentially have malicious script embedded in them. 如需跨網站指令碼攻擊的詳細資訊，請參閱文件 Q252985，「 如何以防止跨網站指令碼處理安全性問題 」 [Microsoft Knowledge Base](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37115)網站。For more information about cross-site scripting attacks, see article Q252985, "How to Prevent Cross-Site Scripting Security Issues" on the [Microsoft Knowledge Base](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=37115) Web site. ## Examples 下列範例回應傳回至用戶端瀏覽器的用戶端的名稱。The following example echoes the client's name back to the client's browser. 方法會刪除任何惡意指令碼 」 和 「 無效的字元可能會在提交`UserName`輸入的欄位。The method strips any malicious script and invalid characters that may have been submitted in the `UserName` input field. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這個方法搭配大型檔案時，呼叫此方法可能會擲回例外狀況。When this method is used with large files, calling the method might throw an exception. 可以搭配此方法之檔案的大小取決於 Web 伺服器的硬體組態。The size of the file that can be used with this method depends on the hardware configuration of the Web server. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文件 812406，< PRB:: Response.WriteFile 無法下載大型檔案 > [Microsoft Knowledge Base](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=149903)網站。For more information, see article 812406, "PRB: Response.WriteFile Cannot Download a Large File" on the [Microsoft Knowledge Base](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=149903) Web site. ## Examples 下列範例會將名為文字檔案的所有內容`Login.txt`（其中可能包含常值的 HTML 文字和輸入控制項） 直接寫入輸出資料流。The following example writes all the contents of a text file named `Login.txt` (which might contain literal HTML text and input controls) directly to the output stream. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用進行後置的快取輸出快取頁面中的替代方法。You can use the method for post-cache substitution in your output-cached pages. 藉由傳遞物件至回呼方法與規定簽章，您可以取代輸出快取在任何給定的位置，在網頁快取內容。By passing a object to a callback method with a prescribed signature, you can replace output cached content at any given location in the page cache. 若要起始取代，呼叫方法，將回呼方法，這必須是安全執行緒，而且可以是下列任一項傳遞給它：To initiate the replacement, call the method, passing it the callback method, which must be thread safe and can be either of the following: - 容器網頁或使用者控制項上的靜態方法。A static method on the container page or user control. - 靜態或執行個體上其他的任意物件的方法。A static or instance method on another arbitrary object. 第一次要求頁面，呼叫委派至產生的輸出。On the first request to the page, the calls the delegate to produce the output. 然後，將會加入替代緩衝的回應，其中保留要在未來的要求呼叫的委派。Then, it adds a substitution buffer to the response, which retains the delegate to call on future requests. 最後，它會降低用戶端快取功能從公用伺服器專用，以確保未來的要求頁面重新叫用委派不在用戶端上快取。Finally, it degrades client-side cacheability from public to server-only, ensuring future requests to the page re-invoke the delegate by not caching on the client. > [!NOTE] > 使用者控制層級的輸出快取套用所在的快取的使用者控制項不支援快取後替換。Post-cache substitution is not supported for a cached user control where output caching is applied at the user control level. 這也稱為片段快取。This is also known as fragment caching. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[快取的 ASP.NET 網頁的部分](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cdd8e523-7305-4685-a456-c5be1de1367e)。For more information, see [Caching Portions of an ASP.NET Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cdd8e523-7305-4685-a456-c5be1de1367e).
